original_title: Rupee opens at 327/328.50 against the US dollar, bond yields steady
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s treasury bond yields were steady and the rupee opened stronger in the spot market on Thursday, dealers said.
A 01.07.2025 bond was quoted at 31.25/75 percent on Thursday, steady from 31.25/30 percent on Wednesday.
A 15.09.2027 bond was quoted at 28.30/29.00 percent, steady from 28.25/29.00 percent on Wednesday.
Sri Lanka rupee opened at 327/328.50 rupees against the US dollar strengthened, from 328.50/329.50 rupees from a day earlier. (Colombo/ March30/2023)
